law.text:
** CONTINGENCY - IN EFFECT - CHAPTER 170 OF 2011 **
otherwise eligible individuals are not denied, in whole or in part, the receipt of emergency unemployment compensation authorized by the federal Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2008, the Unemployment Compensation Extension Act of 2008, the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, or the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010; and
the State receives maximum reimbursement from the federal government for the payment of the emergency benefits.
